title: Catalans
summary: The Catalans[9] are an ethnic group[10][11][12] native to Catalonia, who speak the Romance language Catalan.[13] The current official category of "Catalans" is that of the citizens of Catalonia, an autonomous community in Spain[14] and the inhabitants of the Roussillon historical region in southern France, today the Pyrénées Orientales department,[15] also called Northern Catalonia[16][17][18] and Pays Catalan in French.[19][20][21][22]
